txt.en: The Festival Garden of Duillond is rife with pesky pests, and some very practical help is needed to rid the garden of its problems.
Defeat shrews in the Festival Garden at Duillond

The Festival Garden of Duillond is rife with pesky pests.\n\nYou should defeat as many shrews as you can to help the Elves cleanse their garden of chaos so that the young plants may have a chance to grow.

The Festival Garden of Duillond is rife with pesky pests.\n\nYou should defeat as many shrews as you can to help the Elves cleanse their garden of chaos so that the young plants may have a chance to grow.
So impressed by your prowess are the Elves that they have bestowed yet another title upon you: Tamer of Shrews.
